answers.answer: Sounds like an infection, although what is the difficult to part. Either Yeast, UTI or BV. There are kits you can get to test yourself OTC--or if you choose you can see a doctor.

I have been treated for Bladder Infection, Yeast, and UTI . . I have had this problem since Feb. when my period comes, it goes away.. relief! as soon as its over I go right back to pain., itching, RED, swollen.. bleeding, sore.. angry GINA. I havnt been diagnosed, but Diabetes runs in my family, I research alot.. and think possible HIGH Blood Sugar.. can cause this problem.. havnt been the the GYNO in 14 yrs or so.. not sure if I should consult Regular DR.. or Gyno...

question: I have pain, itching, burning vagina, and bubbles in urine
title: Pain in vagina
